Pre-Game Insights: The series will start off with T20Is on July 27 at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium.
India will be touring Sri Lanka following their historic T20 World Cup championship win.
The series will mark the first time both teams will play under their new coaches, Gautam Gambhir for India and Sanath Jayasuriya for Sri Lanka.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wonder Cement announced as the title sponsor for India’s Tour of Sri Lanka.
Wonder Cement will engage in multiple activations during the series, including during the National Anthem, Batter’s entry, and CSR activities.
The brand's logo will appear behind the wicket, on the stumps, and throughout the perimeter branding.
